snippet: A Washington, D.C., museum announced Friday that it will display the rifle that sniper Charles Whitman used to kill 16 people and wound 32 others from atop the University of Texas clock tower in 1966....

headline.print_headline: DC Museum to Display Texas Tower Sniper's Rifle
headline.main: DC Museum to Display Texas Tower Sniper's Rifle

lead_paragraph: A Washington, D.C., museum announced Friday that it will display the rifle that sniper Charles Whitman used to kill 16 people and wound 32 others from atop the University of Texas clock tower in 1966.
